title: The Mad Archives, Vol. 1
description: Before the existence of pop-culture sharpshooter MAD MAGAZINE there was the original MAD â€” as in, Tales Calculated to Drive You MAD! Twenty-three comic book issues that threw the rule-book out the window and redefined comedy and satire for generations to come. It's visionary humor in a jugular vein, presented in a handsome hardcover format. Here is where it all began.
author: Wallace Wood
